trans-unit.source: A trigger action that advances a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"></xref> to the end of its fill period.
trans-unit.target: Egy eseményindító művelet, amely kiadásokban a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"> </xref> a fill időszak végéig.

trans-unit.source: Use a SkipStoryboardToFill action with an <xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger> or a <xref:System.Windows.Trigger> to advance a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> to its fill period, if it has one.
trans-unit.target: A SkipStoryboardToFill művelettel egy <xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger>vagy egy <xref:System.Windows.Trigger>ahhoz, hogy egy <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>a fill időszak, ha van ilyen.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> </xref:System.Windows.Trigger> </xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger>

trans-unit.source: This action also advances all child <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline> objects of the target <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> to their fill periods, if they have them.
trans-unit.target: Ez a művelet is kiadásokban minden gyermek <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline>a cél objektumok <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>a fill időszakokra, ha vannak.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline>

trans-unit.source: SkipStoryboardToFill only affects an active <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> (after the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> starts).
trans-unit.target: Csak az érinti az aktív SkipStoryboardToFill <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>(után a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>kezdődik).</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>

trans-unit.source: Pause, Resume, Stop, or Otherwise Control a Storyboard Interactively To be able to pause, resume, or otherwise control a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A> interactively, set the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> property of its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> and use a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction> object (such as <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard>, or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard>) to control it by referencing its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Szüneteltetése, folytatása, állítsa le vagy a Storyboard interaktív módon kell képesnek lennie szüneteltethető, ellenkező esetben a vezérlő folytatásához, vagy más módon szabályozhatja a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A>interaktív módon, állítsa be a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>tulajdonsága a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>, és egy <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction>objektum (például <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard>, vagy <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard>) átvehetik a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> Vezérlőpultjának</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> is unspecified, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A> cannot be interactively controlled after it is begun.
trans-unit.target: Ha a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>nincs megadva, a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A>nem interaktív módon vezérelhető után azt kezdődött.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>

trans-unit.source: See [How to: Control a Storyboard After It Starts](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) for more information.
trans-unit.target: Lásd: [hogyan: szabályozhatja a Storyboard után kezdődik](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) további információt.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.SkipStoryboardToFill"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Egy új példányát inicializálja a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.SkipStoryboardToFill"> </xref> osztály.
